sentence: This transmittal reports the inclusion of the following       additional MDE items: fifty (50) GBU-39/B Small Diameter       Bombs, Increment I (SDB-I); and one hundred sixty-four (164)       BLU-109 2000 lb hard-target-penetrator bombs.
title: Arms Sales Notification

sentence: On November 29, 2017, Congress was notified by       congressional certification transmittal number 0S-17 of the       supplemented description of JDAM tail kit component KMU-556       (GBU-31) for MK-84 warheads, KMU-557 (GBU-31) for BLU-109       warheads and KMU-572 (GBU-38) for MK-82 warheads as either C/      B or E/B variants (MDE items).
title: Arms Sales Notification

sentence: The following non-MDE       items were also included: MK22 MOD 4 5-inch rocket motors;       AN/PRC-158 radios; communications equipment; Global       Positioning System (GPS) receivers and precise positioning       provided by Selective Availability Anti-Spoofing Module or M-      Code; forward repair systems; spare and repair parts; Special       Tools and Test Equipment (STTE); technical manuals and       publications; New Equipment Training (NET); site surveys;       transportation; U.S.
title: Arms Sales Notification

sentence: Non-Major Defense Equipment: The following non-MDE items       will be included: APKWS spare parts; support equipment;       missile software; training; U.S.
title: Arms Sales Notification

sentence: Non-Major Defense Equipment: The following non-MDE items       will also be included: AMRAAM control section spares and       containers; spare and repair parts, consumables, accessories,       and repair and return support; weapon system support and       software; classified software delivery and support;       classified publications and technical documentation;       personnel training and training equipment; U.S.
title: Arms Sales Notification

sentence: Non-Major Defense Equipment: The following non-MDE items       will be included: aircraft components, spares, and       accessories; explosive charges, devices, propellants, and       components; spare parts, consumables and accessories, and       repair and return support; U.S.
title: Arms Sales Notification

sentence: Non-Major Defense Equipment: The following non-MDE items       will also be included: LwCLU Basic Skills Trainers; Javelin       missile simulation rounds; Battery Coolant Units; spare       parts; tool kits and support equipment; equipment training;       U.S.
title: Arms Sales Notification

sentence: On August 26, 2020, Congress was notified by Congressional       certification transmittal number 20-0J of Australia's request       for the inclusion of the following non-MDE items and       services: spares and repair/return parts: consumables and       support equipment; publications and technical documentation;       maintenance, training and training equipment; U.S.
title: Arms Sales Notification

sentence: Non-MDE: The following non-MDE items will be included:       major modifications and       maintenance support; spare parts, consumables and       accessories, and repair and return support; personnel       training and training equipment; U.S.
title: Arms Sales Notification

sentence: This transmittal reports the inclusion of the following       additional MDE items: thirty-five (35) Multifunctional       Information Distribution System Joint Tactical Radio Systems       Variant 5 (MIDS JTRS V5).
title: Arms Sales Notification

sentence: The total cost of the new MDE items was $31       million, increasing the total estimated MDE value to $720       million.
title: Arms Sales Notification
